act_a_phone_call_voice.ryan_1: Jenna… great timing to pick up, because I’m currently knee-deep in a sticky situation and could really use you right now.
act_a_phone_call_voice.jenna_1: You’re kidding me. I’m in the middle of a recon.
act_a_phone_call_voice.ryan_2: I know, I know—I'm sorry! Just—this vehicle I've been tracking for a while… and it's right in front of me!
act_a_phone_call_voice.jenna_2: Yeah, yeah—send the ping. Just don’t get yourself killed before I get there.

act_one_a.join_pursuit_desc: Join Ryan Cooper in the high-speed chase through the city streets.

act_one_chase.stop_car_desc: Damage the escaping vehicle to disable it.
